title: The Life in your hands [Greek version]
creator_credit: Anti Cancer Council and R. Barrington-Scott
brief_description: Emphasises precautions women should take against breast cancer and cancer of the cervix. By regularly checking for breast lumps and having smear tests, women can detect these cancers at an early stage. In Greek language only - no English subtitles.
